title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Emotional Labor Management Strategies in Online Educational Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and online teaching experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the three types of emotional labor in online environments (display rules, emotional regulation, emotional experience)
Learners can practice maintaining professional attitudes by utilizing emotional suppression strategies during text-based communication
Learners can apply positive emotional communication techniques through vocal tone and verbal expressions to online science classes
Learners can identify three or more stress factors caused by online educators' emotional labor and propose mitigation strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
